response: In deciding how to allocate the payment received from the client  our primary goal should be fairness  given the effort contributed by both team members. Since the project was completed with equal collaboration  the fairest way forward is to split the payment equally between both parties. Given this  the allocation will be as follows:- Recognizing the equal contributions of both developers  each person stands to gain from the project equally.- There are no additional expenses such as software licenses or tools to deduct from this amount  allowing us to simplify calculations and ensure fairness. - This split not only incentivizes both partners equally but also builds trust  promoting future fruitful collaborations.
